org.bff.javampd.events

Class PlayerBasicChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.bff.javampd.events.PlayerBasicChangeEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PlayerBasicChangeEvent
extends EventObject
    Represents a change in the status of a music player.
    Author:
    Bill
